flawed_nl_solution:
After 20 new students joined the class at the start of the school year, the number of students increased to 160+20 = <<160+20=180>>180
However, at the end of the year, 1/3*180 = <<1/3*180=540/1>>540/1 students had transferred from the school.
The total number of students remaining in the school at the end of the year is 180-540/1 = <<180-540/1=-360>>-360
#### -360

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 540/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
